text: What use is wealth if you cannot spend it ostentatiously? The only question is where we ought to display our great fortunes.

A veteran captain has arrived in your capital seeking men to raid the shores of Brittania. The allegiance of this man will not be given cheaply, but their experience leading men may be valuable to your armies.

Word reaches you that an exceptional bad of Viking warriors, famous for their daring raids, are drinking in your port. The allegiance of such men does not come cheaply, but it may be worth your while.

Word reaches you that a large number of Vikings have stopped at your port on their way to raid monasteries in Frankia. With enough incentive, they could sail under your banners and against your enemies.
Demonstrate our wealth to local nobles
Maintain Public Order to avoid the potential for Slave Rebellions
Tribute may be spent to acquire Vikingar, Hero Units, and other benefits.
